FAQ

Frequenty asked questions

Why you have a price range instead of a single price for a service?

The exact cost depends on the type of material you need to use and the overall design you choose therefore we provide range instead of exact price.

How do you take payments?

We take from 10-20% of the payment in advance and rest of the payment within 10 days of project completion.
